definition: to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: The normal value of dark adaptation of adults was within 50 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 青年人暗適應時問正常值在50秒以內。

sentences.english: The bleaching and the dark adaptation time were automatically controlled and recorded.
sentences.chinese: 強光漂白與暗適應計時自動控制。

sentences.english: The experimental results indicate the dark adaption time of drivers has great difference.
sentences.chinese: 實測結果表明駕駛員的暗適應時間有較顯著的差異。

sentences.english: Dark Alex fits much more comfortably into the hacker mould.
sentences.chinese: 亞歷克斯暗適應模具黑客入從容得多。
